channel.title: Need help with Vista/Run Cmd
channel.description:
I type "Run" and type in "Command" or "Cmd" and type "Ipconfig" or "Ipconfig/all" and it say's 'Ipconfig' or 'ipconfig/all' is not recognized as an internal or external command or operable Program or Batch file.
Can someone tell me why it say's that? I am using a Window's Vista compatable "Run" guide...

item.title: Need help with Vista/Run Cmd
item.dc:creator: @Microsoft11 Microsoft1
item.description:
@Microsoft11 wrote:

Hey, thank you cookie :).

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with Vista/Run Cmd
item.dc:creator: @Fat_Cookies Fat Cookies
item.description:
@Fat_Cookies wrote:

set your “PATH” variable as
%systemroot%;%systemroot%\system32;C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_XX\bin;

XX being the Update version of JDK 6

Read full topic
